Posts.Content: Jul 9, 2009 07:14PM laryy48 wrote: Hi...my wife, Kathy, was put on Xeloda along with Taxotere for her breast cancer.  The combination worked wonders for her.  Kathy tolerated the Xeloda pretty well with no serious side effects.  I hope you mom has the same success.   Laryy48
